text: Adrenomyeloneuropathy is a rare inherited disorder. It is a form of X-linked adrenoleukodystrophy. Leukodystrophy causes a disruption to the myelin covering that protects nerves. == Other websites == *Canada Medical Journal * *http://www.amnhelp.com/ *United Leukodystrophy Foundation reference * * Category:Genetic disorders
title: Adrenomyeloneuropathy
